attributes.action: public hold a meeting to find out why the standards of living are better in Australia, Canada and New Zealand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the early 90's the UK was a pleasure to live in. It did not have halve the problems it has to date.

Nowadays these countries have much better standards of life than we do. This cannot be denied either.
We genrally have more
1)Yobs
2)Depressed people
3)Homeless people
4)Immagrants moving in
5)Tax

Yes these are some of MANY examples of what we have more of. Please hold a talk in the house of commons about this issue and get it shown on public TV. Afterwards you should think of ways to get the standards of living back to how they once were and implement them so we actually can enjoy being british rather than looking for a place to emmagrate to.
